product.name: Pastry Boxes
product.description:
Wholesale Custom Printed Pastry Boxes Packaging

To preserve delightful pastry products the manufacturers need firm packaging. pastry boxes give protection from moisture so the quality is preserved. PackagingAid is offering reliable packaging with high qualities and low prices.

We feel proud of the fact that we consider every cost-cutting aspect. From the manufacturing boxes to shipping at your doorsteps. We provide cost-effective solutions and charge wholesale prices for your custom pastry boxes. Let’s have a spectacular experience of reduced costs and maximum savings.

Packaging & Food Safety

Package design and production play a vital role in limiting the shelf life of a food product. The right choice of packaging materials keeps product quality fresh.

Advancement in food packaging plays a central role in keeping the U.S. food supply among the safest in the world. Packaging retains the benefits of food processing after the process is finished. It allows food to travel reliably for long distances and still be nutritious at the time of consumption.

Packaging technology must adjust food protection with other concerns too. Including service and material expenses, emphasized environmental awareness. This is where Packaging-Aid cardboard pastry boxes are beneficial. They give a perfect packaging box free of chemicals and contagions.

Quality Material Suppliers

The factor that requires prior attention is the pastry box material. Corrugated pastry boxes are made up of material that makes them ideal for massive orders. Kraft or card stock is ideal for food packaging. It comes in natural brown, unbleached, heavy-duty, and bleached white. The natural kraft is the most substantial.

No need to worry about the material quality as PackagingAid overcomes all your worries. By offering you the takeout boxes leak-proof and add multi-layered cardboard sheets that store your baked food. Airtight packaging protects it from getting rotted by hazardous factors.

Pastry Boxes With Display Windows

Want to display your gorgeous pastry masterpieces? PackagingAid creates durable and presentable pastry boxes with windows. You can easily display the quality of your products and the effort you took to create a lavish design. Unique outlook, which in itself is sufficient to heighten the beauty of the product packed inside.

These pastry display boxes can be customized according to the requirements of the customers. You can also add windows cut in the shape of your choice. On your wedding day, you can order pastry items as a sign of love. For sale for valentine’s day, the boxes take the shape of red-colored hearts with a PVC window.

Free Shipping

Worried about the shipping cost and handling? You don’t need to! PackagingAid offers a free shipping facility on every order of pastry boxes wholesale to make sure that your product is delivered to you at your desired location without any harm. After ordering wholesale pastry boxes you get your shipment tracking id from our client care department to check your shipment status.

product.shortDescription:
CUSTOM PASTRY BOXES

Nobody likes having offensive pastry boxes on their bakery counters. Custom pastry boxes enhance their freshness and refinement. Do you have innovative ideas to make your pastry box well-defined? Wholesale custom pastry boxes are well-designed and used for this purpose. The packaging is composed in a way to cater to your demands.

PackagingAid.com is the name of affordability and premium quality. Digital Artwork and offset presses along with the latest methods secure the first-rated printing of pastry products. We employ the finest materials for the manufacturing of our pastry Boxes. Furthermore, our boxes are quality tested at multiple levels to secure their strength and stability.
